sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 70-8-2 - Recompiled
sections.text: Recompilation.— The Emergency Petroleum Products Supply Act has been recompiled by Laws 2005, ch. 22, § 4 as part of the Chapter 12, Article 12 NMSA 1978. Former Section 70-8-1 NMSA 1978 has been recompiled as 12-12-10 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2005.
